description: Play sounds when Claude needs user attention

hooks.command: cat > /dev/null; powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File "$CLAUDE_PLUGIN_ROOT/hooks/play-sound.ps1" question 2>/dev/null || bash "$CLAUDE_PLUGIN_ROOT/hooks/play-sound.sh" question
cat > /dev/null; powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File "$CLAUDE_PLUGIN_ROOT/hooks/play-sound.ps1" complete 2>/dev/null || bash "$CLAUDE_PLUGIN_ROOT/hooks/play-sound.sh" complete
cat > /dev/null; powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File "$CLAUDE_PLUGIN_ROOT/hooks/play-sound.ps1" question 2>/dev/null || bash "$CLAUDE_PLUGIN_ROOT/hooks/play-sound.sh" question
